attributes.action: get rid of the surpream court and use an independ court for matters like bank charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like to see a fair court handle matters like bank charges not the old lords where most are directors of banks or chair the bored of them i think it is unfair to the millions that are strugling to eat let alone keep there house on a dission from lords only intrested in there millions in there wage letting the banks print there own money and rob the poor all the time it is ok for the lords to sit there saying that the bank charges are fair when they will never be court up in the debt spiral coused by the charges I just think it was wrong to let the lords with there intrest in the banks and sitting on the bored of them was fair on the millions in deep trouble with the bank charges the surpream court should not be allowed to pass jugement on thing of this matter when they will be byest and only looking after themselfs and not the people of the land
